targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ("date" + "time") as time,
  carbo_temp_z1_mes as temperatura_medida
FROM
  carbo_mes
ORDER BY
  time DESC
LIMIT 17000;

SELECT
  ("date" + "time") as time,
  carbo_temp_z1_con as temperatura_target
FROM
  carbo_con
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 17000;

SELECT carbo_temp_z1_mes as temperatura_medida 
FROM carbo_mes
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT carbo_temp_z1_con as temperatura_target 
FROM carbo_con
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;
